tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE songwriters_and_composers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    years_active INT
)

CREATE TABLE songs(
	 song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	 song_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	 songwriter_id INT,
	 composer_id INT,
	 release_date DATE,
	 FOREIGN KEY (songwriter_id) REFERENCES songwriters(songwriter_id),
	 FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES composers(composer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Songs (
  song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  song_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  release_date DATE,
  songwriter_id INT,
  composer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (songwriter_id) REFERENCES Songwriters(songwriter_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES Composers(composer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE composers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR,
    awards INT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR,
    genre VARCHAR,
    release_date DATE,
    songwriter_id INT,
    composer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE singers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR,
    awards INT
);
